parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the zoom level ('''F'''ield '''O'''f '''V'''iew) start and end values for automatical zooming. <comment><!-- "automatical"? LoL ;-) --></comment>
<br>
The default zoom level is ''<tt>0.7</tt>'' where ''<tt>0</tt>'' is the nearest and ''<tt>1</tt>'' is the most far zoom value.
 <br><br><template><title>warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value>This command is '''non-functional'''!</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFovRange''' fovRange </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fovRange: [[Array]] - zoom level, range 0 to 1 (see description above) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[camSetFovRange]] [0.1, 0.7];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camSetFov]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
